about_the_game:
The Rotting Chronicles

The Rotting Chronicles is a survival action game set in a zombie-ravaged city where you must fight, scavenge, craft, and rebuild to survive. Explore a decaying city, build your shelter, and fight to reclaim humanity’s place at the top of the food chain. Run solo or with up to 4 friends as you grow your survival skills and find the best strategy to adapt to a world full of danger. Your ultimate goal is not just to survive, but to rebuild humanity’s place at the top.

Features:

Survive in a World of the Undead

  • Scavenge for resources and fortify your shelter to defend against relentless zombie hordes.

  • Face a dynamic, ever-changing world where every decision counts—survival depends on your ability to adapt and outsmart the growing horde.

  • The horde may have rotten brains but your actions still draw their attention. Be stealthy, or prepare to face the horde's wrath, it's up to you.

Play Your Way

  • Build your own unique playstyle with a mix of stealth, combat, strategy, and different weapons to overcome the overcome the onslaught of undead and evolving environmental hazards.

  • Tackle challenges solo or with up to 3 other friends in the face of an ever-changing threat.

  • Final Death: If you die, you start over... your character may be gone, but their legacy lives on.

Build and Grow Your Shelter

  • Craft weapons, upgrade your base, and gather supplies to expand your shelter.

  • Find NPC survivors and invite them home, then manage resources like water, food, and raw materials to keep everyone alive.

Evolving Survivor Progression

  • The Continuous Improvement system provides in-depth progression that rewards your playstyle and decisions by naturally evolving your character's abilities to match how you play, creating a unique build based on your choices.

  • Evolve from vulnerable prey to a predator, gradually regaining control of the environment.

Fight for Survival in Unique Zones

  • Zombies aren't the only problems you'll encounter - unpredictable weather and strange natural disasters join forces to create new opportunities and more dangerous hazards, but may offer more exciting rewards.

  • Navigate these dangerous infected zones where shifting environments affect the behavior of zombies.

  • Find or Craft special equipment to survive the challenges they offer and gather rare materials for crafting.

Are you ready to reclaim this world, one step at a time?

Disclaimer: The Rotting Chronicles is still in development. The content and features are still evolving, and we greatly value your feedback, which can be shared through our Discord and other communication channels. Our goal is to create a game that resonates with both our team and the community. Additional features and enhancements will be introduced over time. For updates and detailed roadmaps, please follow us on social media and stay tuned for the latest developments on The Rotting Chronicles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 | AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
